scripts.mockAPI_CI: npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/Task2/MockAPIResponse.js " --browser chrome --headless || true && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.apiHeadless_CI: npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/Task3/APITestingHeadless.js" --browser chrome --headless || true && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.E2Etest_CI: npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/Task4/E2EUIApplication.js" --browser chrome --headless || true && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
